Khaja Ghar

Restaurant Food Ordering System

Khaja Ghar is a comprehensive food ordering management system that revolutionizes the restaurant dining experience. The platform provides a user-friendly interface that allows customers to order food directly from their devices while enabling kitchen staff to view and manage orders efficiently.

Main Objectives

  • Manage food ordering system efficiently
  • Edit and view order status in real-time
  • Improve operational efficiency for restaurant staff
  • Reduce customer waiting times and increase satisfaction
  • Optimize stock levels and minimize food wastage
  • Provide cost-effective solution for restaurant management

How Khaja Ghar Works

Khaja Ghar provides a seamless dining experience where customers can order food directly from their own devices without waiting for waiters. The system includes:

  • Customer Access: QR code or token-based verification for menu access
  • Kitchen Integration: Real-time order viewing for cooking staff
  • Admin Control: Complete management of staff, products, and orders
  • Real-time Data: Live updates for stock optimization and waste reduction

Design & Documentation

Core System Capabilities

  • Customer Functions: Order placement, order editing, menu browsing
  • Kitchen Integration: Real-time order viewing and preparation coordination
  • Admin Management: Staff management, product CRUD operations, order oversight
  • Data Storage: Comprehensive order details and customer information
  • Error Handling: Robust validation and user notification system

Project Impact & Benefits

  • Enhanced customer satisfaction through reduced waiting times
  • Simplified ordering process without traditional waitstaff dependency
  • Improved operational efficiency and cost reduction
  • Real-time data utilization for inventory optimization
  • Significant reduction in food waste and improved profitability
  • Thoroughly tested platform ensuring error-free operation
